title: Delete the ignored TestSolrCloudWithKerberos test
description: TestSolrCloudWithKerberos is ignored and TestSolrCloudWithKerberosAlt was introduced to substitute it. We should delete this test.. and perhaps rename the TestSolrCloudWithKerberosAlt test to this.
